job.title: Associate Machine Learning Engineer
job.description:
Job Summary

Builds & maintains machine learning and big data pipelines to support advanced analytics, data science, and AI/ML solutions.

Job Responsibilities
  • Assists in development of software that processes, stores and serves data and machine learning models for use by others.
  • Assists in development of data structures and pipelines to organize, collect and standardize data that helps generate insights and intelligence to support business needs.
  • Writes ETL (Extract / Transform / Load) or ELT processes, designs data stores and develops tools for real-time and offline analytic processing on premise or on cloud infrastructure.
  • Assists in development of data and ML pipelines that are scalable, repeatable and secure
  • Assists in troubleshooting software and processes for data consistency and integrity. Integrates data from a variety of sources, assuring that they adhere to data quality and accessibility standards.
  • Escalates problems and roadblocks as they occur
  • Interacts with team members and peers and may interact with external peers to provide semi-routine information related to assigned tasks.
Basic Qualifications
  • Bachelor's degree
  • Experience establishing and maintaining key relationships with internal (peers, business partners and leadership) and external (business community, clients and vendors) within a matrix organization to ensure quality standards for service.
  • Willing to travel up to 10% of the time for business purposes (within state and out of state).
Preferred Qualifications
  • Knowledge of SQL or programming skills in one or more of the following: Python, C, C++, Spark, Scala, and/or Java
  • Exposure to Azure
